channel.title: Packets
channel.description:
Well, I am working on a 377 framework. I need the packets for the server and I cannot find them. I have the following but I need more. :/ [b]List of packet ID's[/b]
PACKET ID EXECUTE 56 Commands 213 Walking 28 Walking 247 Walking 79 Command Buttons 1 Item on Item 3 Unequip Items 4 Dropping items 6 Recieve packet when client finished loading graphics 19 Clicking in client frame 24 Equiping items 49 Chatting 50 Objects (3rd option click) 71 Pick up items (ground) 75 Item amount 123 Switching items in bag (swap) 140 Moving camera 152 Item on object? 176 Changing chat options 181 Objects (first click option) 187 Lose focus 202 Logout 226 Dialogue clicks 228 Items (second click option) 241 Objects (second click option) 22 Send static value?? (38304) 40 Idle (not sure) 78 Recieved at login.. 248 Idle ??
^ those are packets I have atm. Once I have completed most of the packets, I am surely likely to release the source for others to use. But, I need your help to make this list become bigger. :/ Thank you if you can help. Patrick: )

item.title: Packets
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

Blah, I’ll search through the 377 client; it should have them there.

EDIT: That’s not them but I got a better list now

item.title: Packets
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

Packet Types;

81 = UpdatePlayers;
176 = Create Loggin Screen;
65 = Spawn Ground Item;
185 = unknown, Change look maybe.
107 = unknown, Sets Boolean Array to false;
72 = unknown, Another Interface thingy
214 = Update Ignore List.
166 = Move Camera
134 = Set Stats
71 = Change Tab Interface Data
74 = Set Current Song
121 = Change Song
109 = Logout (maybe)
70 = Another Interface thing.
73 and 241 = Some deobs, Resets map
241 = Mod some 3index integer array XD
241 = Again, Another reference, Seams it also initlizes the client for the first time, Setting load messages and NPC + Player locations ect.
208 = method60 Function, Will Investigate.
99 = Set a random Integer.
75 = Another Interface Function.
114 = Set a random Integer.
60 = method137 Function.
35 = Unknown
174 = Play a sound i believe (Such as attacking and dieing)
104 = PlayerAction change, Maybe Animations
78 = Set X Cords Perhaps.
253 = Send Mesage(Chat, Duel, Trade)
1 = Reset NPC + Player Animations.
50 = Friend Logs in/Out
110 = Set Player Energy
254 = Unknown, Lots of Assignments and If’s
248 = Dialog and Dialog Inputs.
79 = Scroll Related, Maybe Chat Window.
68 = Set Settings.
196 = New Chat Message (public), Does Censor and removes chats from ignores XD
85 = More Integer Stuff
24 = Menu Tab Related
246 = Interface Related, Maybe Items
171 = Interface, Enable Buttons maybe
142 = Dialog state change
126 = Interface + Message Related, Maybe Split Pchat
206 = Set Trade + private + public chat/trade modes
240 = Set Player weight
8 = Interface Related
122 = Set text Color.
53 = Moddify Tabs in some way
230 = Interface Related
221 = Tab Related
117 = Move Camera
249 = Unknown
65 = Update NPC’s
27 = Create Message Prompt
187 = Same as 27, But second status
97 = Interface Dialog
218 = Create Interface
87 = Set Settings
36 = Set Settings, Looks same as 87
61 = Set an Integer
200 = Modify Interface
219 = Change Dialog
34 = Modify Interface
105,84,147,215,4,117,156,44,160,101,151 = method137, Different Paremeters depending on Code
106 = Set Active Tab
164 = Change Interface ID

From a file I had, somewhere.

Read full topic
